content:
衛生福利部民國107年7月20日 衛部秘字第1072161286號通知單註銷密等
III. PERSONAL HISTORY AND PROPOSED STUDY NOTICE PERSONNELLE ET ÉTUDES ENVISAGÉES continued - suite
Name :
C. Y. Chang Chen
Nom :
13. Proposed field of study Domaine d'étude envisagé
Preparation of Polio Vaccine
To be completed in the language which will be used in the major proposed country of study : A remplir dans la langue qui sera utilisée dans le pays où vous vous proposez principalement d'étudier :
14. Detailed description of particular fields of interest and of Désignation détaillée des domaines qui vous intéressent spé- . subject matter to be studied : cialement et du sujet que vous comptez étudier :
I. Production of Method
1. Health control of monkeys
2. Cultivation of monkey kidney cells
3. Cultivation of attenuated poliovirus
4. Preparation of monovalent poliovirus suspension
5. Preparation of polyvalent poliovaccine
II. Assay
1. Physical properties
2. Chemical properties
3. Sterility test
4. Safty test a. Marker test
b. Neutrotropism
5. Potency test
III. Stabilization and Preservation of Poliovaccine
15. Description of the practical use you will make of this study on your return home in relation to the responsibilities you expect to assume, and the conditions existing in your country in the field of your interests.
Dites comment vous pensez tirer parti de vos études après votre retour à l'occasion des fonctions que vous aurez à assumer dans votre pays et compte tenu des conditions qui y règnent dans le domaine auquel vous vous intéressez.
According to the published statistics there has been an increase of 6.11% of poliomyelites cases each year and approximately 2000 fatal ones during the past five years. The supply of polio vaccines both Salk-type and oral depends entirely on imports from Canada and the U. S .. It is anticipated that on my return home, I will be responsible for producing and standardization the vaccine locally in the hope that within a few years more than one million children under the age of four will have adequate supply of polio vaccines.
Academia Historica

According to the published statistics there has been an increase of 6.11% of poliomyelites cases each year and approximately 2000 fatal ones during the past five years. The supply of polio vaccines both Salk-type and oral depends entirely on imports from Canada and the U. S .. It is anticipated that on my return home, I will be responsible for producing and standardization the vaccine locally in the hope that within a few years more than one million children under the age of four will have adequate supply of polio vaccines.
